Key Match Events: The Cleveland Cavaliers gave up 73 points in the first half against the Chicago Bulls.
Pre-Game Insights: Donovan Mitchell said he wants a coach who coaches him hard like Kenny Atkinson has.
Atkinson said the team always asks him to coach them harder.
Post-Match Reflections: Atkinson slammed a little flip-flop at halftime due to the team's defensive effort.
Donovan Mitchell expressed that he prefers to hear how good he is on a daily basis from Atkinson.
Others: The Cleveland Cavaliers won the game despite their poor first-half defense.
